Sentencas: Due to the depletion of traditional fossil fuels and the aggravation of related environmental problems, hydrogen energy is gaining more attention all over the world.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a promising power generation technology operating on hydrogen with a high efficiency.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To further boost the power output of a single cell and thus a single stack, increasing the cell area is an effective route.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, it was recently found that further increasing the effective area of an SOFC single cell with a flat-tubular structure and symmetric double-sided cathodes would result in a lower areal performance.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a multi-physical model is built to study the effect of the effective area on the cell performance.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The distribution of different physical fields is systematically analyzed.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Optimization of the cell performance is also pursued by systematically tuning the cell operating condition and the current collection setup.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An improvement of 42% is revealed by modifying the inlet gas flow rates and by enhancing the current collection.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the future, optimization of cell geometry will be performed to improve the homogeneity of different physical fields and thus to improve the stability of the cell.
Titulo: Numerical multi-physical optimization of operating condition and current collecting setup for large-area solid oxide fuel cells
